data:
I) M/s V Muniswamy is our existing Contractor working for Civils Works at COW Project. Hence where we found his performance is Satisfactory.
Payment Terms & Condition:
1. 100% payment after work completion.
2.Quoted rate are exclusive of GST and any other applicable taxes. The same will be paid on submission of proof of payment to the concerned department.
3. Payment will be made within period of 10 days from the date of bill submission.
4. Payment shall be done for 100% completed borewell individually.
5. No Retention shall be deducted.
II) M/s DHIVYA CONSTRUCTIONS AND CONSTRUCTIONS is our new contractor who is working for Civil projects in and around Chennai.
III) M/s SMD CONSTRUCTIONS is our new contractor who is working for Civil projects in and around Chennai.

As per Site requirement we need to do Borewells for Site drinking water.
On this regards we took quotation from V Muniswamy, Dhivya Construction, SMD Constructions.
V Muniswamy our existing on board contractor has quoted less price than other two vendors,
So from site recommend V Muniswamy for executing Borewells as per requirements.
Hence request your approval for issuing Work Order for V Muniswamy for Borewell Works at COW projects for Rs.7,51,020/-
100% on monthly basis on Bill submission after user verification & submission within 10 days
Annual Contract of Technical Security Officer & Man for one year

We received requirement form operations & maintenance department for renewal of annual contract for Fire Officers & Fire Men to be named as Technical Security Officer & Technical Security Man. The period of annual contract will be from 1st May 2019 to 30th April 2020.
PR no.1100459815 dt.25-06-2019
1.Fire Officer will be named as -Technical Security Officer - Total 4 nos.
2.Fire Man will be named as -Technical Security Man - Total 7 nos.
The requirement is to shift the manpower to security agency with role of Technical Security Staff. The prices are as per the decided rate with the agencies for manpower contract for other manpower requirements.
Commercial Summary as given below:-
Comparartive for Manpower for Technical Security Staff - 2019-2020_28062019092121.xlsx
FW Shifting of Services for Fire Team @ Bennett University to Security Agency_28062019092229.msg
Perfect Management Services - Quotation for Technical Security Staff_28062019093153.pdf
It is recommended to award the PO to L1 vendor M/s Swift Securitas Pvt Ltd for total amount of Rs 45,01,322/- (All Inclusive). The contract period is 01-05-2019 to 30-04-2020.
Supply of Air filter system for IST UV system

Bangalore production  is developing air filtration system for UV system installed in Press to protect the reflectors and other components from ink mist entering the system. Since this project involved concept and design finalization, R&D, multiple design iteration, fabrication and supply, it was decided by production to do the project in multiple phases. They also decided to get the project executed through M/s Aum Techno Spray (Approval mail attached).
In the first phase, Po was released @ Rs 86,540/- + Taxes for double width system. Prototype was developed and installed and based on its Performance it has been decided to get the system developed for both double width and single width system in Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi and Kolkatta. Total 13 systems will be developed. Production has worked with  M/s Aum Techno Spray for design, development and supply of this system and same vendor has been selected by production for work across all locations. ( Mail attached).
Strategy for Buying:
1.	Multi level negotiation
2.	Price benchmarking for EBM PAPST 4650N fan which constitutes appx 50% of cost.
After negotiation following prices were agreed
1. Double width System : Rs 66,500 + GST. Packing @ Rs 4000/ unit + Freight  applicable for other locations
2. Single Width System : Rs 41,500 + GST. Packing @ Rs 3000/ unit + Freight  applicable for other locations
In PC meeting vendor declined to reduce price any further . It has been informed by vendor that drawings and design will remain with him and same shall not be shared with other vendors.
Price calculations  for Air filter system_05072019194024.xlsx
Aum Techno Air filter for UV quotation_05072019194049.msg
Work may be given to M/s Aum Techno Spray as per  above costs and production recommendation.
"This request is for ordering the replacement parts required for Prime UV system at BCCL Kandivali.

"Replacement Parts required for Prime UV system at BCCL Kandivali.
* It is recommended to procure parts from M/s Prime Systems INC for USD 19,370 (landed value INR 18.10*lakh inclusive of taxes at current rate and approx. freight) for Kandivali.
*Conversion factor used is USD 1 = Rs 70. However payment will be made as per actual currency conversion at the time of import
GST has been considered at 18% but it will be paid as per actual."
M/S Rev Eye Technologies Private Limited

This approval pertains to requirement of Proect Janus & total budgeted amount for the same is Rs. 9.4 lakhs (tax inclusive).
Scope of Work:
Consumer Flow as explained in the POC demonstration phase
a??	Consumer scans a QR code from Print ad
a??	On scanning the QR, consumer is taken to a portal which contains advertiser identity, marketing campaign details as shared by the advertiser and list of relevant CTAs
Response currently wants to do a POC with M/S Wowsome and value for POC is Rs. 8 lakhs + taxes , however decision on running complete project would be taken post that for which currently proposal is Rs. 1.32 cr for 3 years.
Vendor Universe:
Response evaluated three vendors a?? Wowsome, Quarks and Yeppar on the following parameters:
1.	Functional evaluation of vendor POC by Business
2.	Technical evaluation by TGIT
3.	Commercial evaluation basis response to RFP
Response has confirmed that they want to go ahead with M/S Wowsome only
Commercial Summary:
 	                       Key parameters	                            Wowsome	Quarks	Yeppar
Phase 1 a?? 3 months	       Prototype Phase with limited client trials	8 L	10 L	7 L
Phase 2 a?? 3 Year projection    Commercial Solution with scalability	      132 L	90 L	70 L
Total project cost for 3 years	                                              140 L	97 L	77 L
Response team have already finalized the vendor, prices & work has also started. Response team has confirmed that this is a critical project and hence they have already finalized everything and shared approvals of President Revenue and Group Head a?? Dig & Strategy (Attached)
Final proposal is Rs. 7.95 lakhs + taxes
Fwd PR # 1100459198 - RESPONSE PROJECT JANUS - Confirmatory_27062019114536.msg
Re JANUS - Closure with WOWSOME about Scope of work and TC 1_27062019114549.msg
Re JANUS - Closure with WOWSOME about Scope of work and TC_27062019114600.msg

It is recommended to release PO on M/S Rev eye Technologies Private Limited with a total payout of Rs. 9,38,100(Tax inclusive)
PO is beng created immediately to support the urgency

This approval pertains to requirement of SCCM & SCOM implementation for BU & total budgeted amount for the same is Rs. 14.75 lakhs(Tax inclusive) - PRs are available.
Background:
In our datacentre at Bennet University, We have hosted 10+ Physical servers, 50+ virtual servers, 20+ applications and 500 desktops/laptops installed at work spaces. We are looking for Microsoft System center Configuration Manager solution to effectively configure and manage from central location & automated monitoring solution to monitor servers and applications to improve availability and troubleshooting.
Scope:
Licenses:
Part Code Description Qty.
9TX-01350 SysCtrOpsMgrCltML ALNG LicSAPk OLV E 1Y Acdmc Ent PerUsr 250
J5A-01180 SysCtrCnfgMgrCltML ALNG LicSAPk OLV E 1Y Acdmc Ent PerUsr 250
DW7-00001 PwrBIProOpenFac ShrdSvr ALNG SubsVL OLV E 1Mth Acdmc AP 5
9EM-00294 WinSvrSTDCore ALNG LicSAPk OLV 2Lic E 1Y Acdmc AP CoreLic 12
9EN-00222 SysCtrStdCore ALNG LicSAPk OLV 2Lic E 1Y Acdmc AP CoreLic 12
Implementation - SCCM & SCOM
Initially EMS licenses and implementation was also there in the scope, however same was put on hold
Vendor Universe:
M/S SoftwareOne & M/S SISL Infotech
OEM: Microsoft for licenses
Commercial Discussion:
Implementation was discussed with both the vendors and M/S SISL infotech was LE vendor with a quote of Rs. 8 lakhs + taxes while M/S Software one was at a value of Rs. 9,13,049 + taxes. Mandays were assessed for the complete proposal of SSM, SCOM & EMS and prices were in line with the benchmarks.
Licenses were directly negotiated with Microsoft & final quote for the same is Rs. 1,00,205 + taxes

It is recommended to release purchase order on M/S SISL Infotech Pvt Ltd with a total payout of Rs. 10,62,242 (Tax inclusive).
Payment - Implementation
40% on project Kick-off day
60% on delivery as per mentioned SOW
Licenses:
Within 30 days of delivery

B&C has received CAPEX approval of Rs. 13.00 lakhs for RTPFC panel at Chandigarh press. Production dept. has forwarded BOQ for electrical works related to panel installation with a budget of Rs. 5.50 Lakhs. Offfers have been received from M/s Swastika Electricals (local supplier recommended by Production dept.) and M/s Distribution Systems (Delhi based contractor). Production dept. has recommended any of the above contractors for the job. Negotiations were conducted from Mumbai office via telecon and the final prices offered by the contractors is as per table beloW.

M/s Swastik Enterprises has offered a final price of Rs. 5.16 Lakhs and stands L1. They are regular contractors for electrical and related works at Chandigarh Press.
The scope of work is non critical and involves supply and installation of cables, earthing, cable trays and supports. Rates are compared with similar scope and found competitive.
In view of the above it is recommended to place order for electrical works related to RTPFC installation at Chandigarh press on M/s Swastik Enterprises for an all inclusive value of Rs. 5,16,044/-
